text: Money in the Bank (2011) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on July 17, 2011 at the Allstate Arena in Rosemont, Illinois. It was the second Money in the Bank event held by WWE. The main event, which saw CM Punk defeat John Cena to win his first WWE Championship, received a rare 5-star rating from Dave Meltzer of the Wrestling Observer Newsletter. Punk left WWE with the title at the end of the show, but returned eight days later on Raw. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Santino Marella and Vladimir Kozlov defeated David Otunga and Michael McGillicutty Tag team match N/A 2 Daniel Bryan defeated Kane, Sin Cara, Wade Barrett, Cody Rhodes, Justin Gabriel, Heath Slater, and Sheamus SmackDown Money in the Bank ladder match for a World Heavyweight Championship contract 24:27 3 Kelly Kelly (c) (with Eve Torres) defeated Brie Bella (with Nikki Bella) Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 4:54 4 Mark Henry defeated Big Show Singles match 6:00 5 Alberto Del Rio defeated Rey Mysterio, Kofi Kingston, Alex Riley, R-Truth, The Miz, Evan Bourne, and Jack Swagger Raw Money in the Bank ladder match for a WWE Championship contract 15:54 6 Christian defeated Randy Orton (c) by disqualification Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship. 12:20 7 CM Punk defeated John Cena (c) Singles match for the WWE Championship 33:44 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match D – This match was a dark mach ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Money in the Bank 2011 website Category:2011 in American television Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:2010s in sports in Illinois Category:WWE Money in the Bank Category:2011 in Illinois Category:July 2011 events
title: Money in the Bank (2011)
